name: Kicking Kittens: Putin Saves The World
name_original: Kicking Kittens: Putin Saves The World
description:
Aliens are invading! Your intelligence agency has informed you of a sinister alien plot. Aliens are invading with robots disguised as kittens to sneak into Russia and launch its nuclear payload. Don't let them start World War III, stop the alien robot kittens from reaching the nuclear launch button and save the world. Collect all 10 symbols of manliness so Putin can unleash his ultimate ability the Aura of Manliness and destroy the alien spaceships.

FEATURES:
10 Action Packed Levels
Alien Robots Disguised As Kittens
5 Bosses to defeat
